mapper.insert: insert into fund_post( post_no, member_id, fund_title, fund_short_title, post_start, post_end, fund_goal, fund_sponsor_count, fund_state ) values( #{postNo}, #{memberId}, #{fundTitle}, #{fundShortTitle}, #{postStart}, #{postEnd}, #{fundGoal}, #{fundSponsorCount}, '진행중' )
mapper.select: select * from fund_post order by post_no desc
